importantTimeframes.descriptionOfWhyTimeFrameIsRelevant: The period during which the U.S. and Colombia are engaged in a diplomatic dispute over drug trafficking operations, U.S. military actions, and economic threats, culminating in the recall of Colombia's ambassador.

keyTakeAways: Colombia has recalled its ambassador to the United States, Daniel García-Peña, for consultations, marking a sharp escalation in diplomatic relations.
The recall follows U.S. actions including military attacks on suspected drug-smuggling vessels and threats to cut economic support to Colombia.
U.S. President Donald Trump accused President Gustavo Petro of promoting illegal drug production and threatened to raise tariffs on Colombian goods.
The U.S. has attacked seven vessels in the Caribbean, resulting in at least 30 deaths, with Colombian officials claiming some victims were Colombian citizens.
This is the second time Colombia has recalled its ambassador to Washington this year, reflecting a pattern of deteriorating diplomatic relations.
Colombia claims U.S. military actions amount to 'murder' and accuses the U.S. of supporting a plot to remove President Petro from power.
The Colombian government, through Foreign Minister Rosa Yolanda Villavicencio Mapy, states it will announce further decisions in due course.

summaryOfNewsArticle: Colombia has recalled its ambassador to the United States, Daniel García-Peña, for consultations, in response to escalating tensions over drug trafficking and U.S. military actions. The move follows a July incident when the U.S. recalled its ambassador in Bogotá and comes after President Donald Trump accused Colombian President Gustavo Petro of promoting drug production and threatened to raise tariffs on Colombian goods. The U.S. has conducted multiple attacks in the Caribbean on vessels suspected of drug trafficking, resulting in at least 30 deaths, with Colombia accusing the U.S. of targeting Colombian nationals and even committing 'murder.' These actions have intensified diplomatic friction, with Colombia asserting that U.S. actions are both unjust and politically motivated, marking the second time this year that Colombia has recalled its ambassador.
title: Colombian ambassador to US recalled to Bogotá for consultations, embassy says
